sentences.en: "G’wan, midget, get out of here before I catch your cold!" the gatekeeper growled.
sentences.cn: “赶紧出去，你这个侏儒，别让我染上你的感冒！”门卫低声咆哮着。

sentences.en: Brazil nuts - inshell and shelled - extra - large , large, medium, midget sizes.
sentences.cn: 巴西坚果 -- 带壳和去壳的 -- 超大型 、 大型 、 中型 、 小型.

sentences.en: From 1942 onward I worked on the first anti - midget - submarine detection systems.
sentences.cn: 从1942年往后,我研究了头一批 反 小型潜艇的探测系统.

sentences.en: If you find a midget tree, please do not sit on it.
sentences.cn: 若你找到了一颗小树, 请勿坐在上面.

sentences.en: Napoleon, who was always considered to be kind of a dwarf, a midget, really wasn't at all.
sentences.cn: 拿破仑被人们公认为是个矮子,夸张点叫侏儒 实际上并非如此

sentences.en: The midget asked Tina to play a part as his assistant in the magic show.
sentences.cn: 马戏团的朱儒邀请蒂娜在魔术表演中担任他的助手.

sentences.en: The Tirpitz had been disabled by the audacious and heroic attack of our midget submarines.
sentences.cn: “提尔古茨”号战列舰由于我们小型潜艇发动的大胆而英勇的袭击而丧失了战斗力.

trans.tran_en: a very offensive word for someone who is very short because their body has not grown normally. Do not use this word.
